name: It's Change But It's True
description:
You've been overpaid! But oh no, it's not a good thing!

Your customer has just given you too much money and you need to give them the correct change. Drag and drop money from the table (orange) in and out of your till (black) until the correct amount of change has been left on the table, and click PAY when done!

(Protip, the amount you move into your till minus the amount you take out should equal the bill!)
